channel.title: Music?
channel.description:
Before the flamation...all i want is a yes or no answer
I have all the runescape music downloaded onto my comp (500 megs total about) Is it possible to put them into my server? Or would i have to create like a downloadable version of it :P
Oh btw..im sorry it was 2 questions

item.title: Music?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

There was one made by Silab, I can’t remember where though :(.
Maybe about that, but it needs a custom client that supports music.
PS
This is Justis

Read full topic

item.title: Music?
item.dc:creator: @eddiex eddiex
item.description:
@eddiex wrote:

Here’s my idea. You know how each music on the music tab has a case id? what if i make it load the music file for each one? good idea or not?

Read full topic

item.title: Music?
item.dc:creator: @afferin afferin
item.description:
@afferin wrote:

If your server has a music player, and you know how to change the songs, you could add the songs there.

You could also make a client, and then add the songs into it, make people download it, then they could play on it, and listen to the music you put in it.

Read full topic

item.title: Music?
item.dc:creator: @Brad_c Brad_c
item.description:
@Brad_c wrote:

Ah, you would have to be Very competent with Java

Good luck, hope you manage it.

Read full topic

item.title: Music?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

IT would req. new ints, voids, frames, and such like that… and they would need the option to switch between songs…
So if you can do alot of work… Go for it![br][size=1]Posted on: January 22, 2007, 04:45:50 PM[/size][hr]Oooh… And you would need a new type of boolean process…
Like, music process?
Make it switch between songs when a new frame(music id) is selected

Read full topic

item.title: Music?
item.dc:creator: @eddiex eddiex
item.description:
@eddiex wrote:

thats not what i was asking…im the owner of a server and i want to know if its possible to have music play for the players -_-; sorta like how the .java files call on eachother…but instead music

Read full topic

item.title: Music?
item.dc:creator: @Brad_c Brad_c
item.description:
@Brad_c wrote:

Put them in the moparscape music folder, and viola, they wont come up on anyone elses, and nt on the game, but the mopar client plays the music
